name: Shackled!
description:
Shackled is a puzzle platformer where you have to escape an eldritch prison. But you are chained to your cellmate!

Use the arrow keys to control one character, and WASD to control the other. 

Down/S key pulls one prisoner towards the other.

The game is designed with a single player experience in mind, but it can be played co-op too! 

Known Issues: There is a few ways you could get stuck and have to restart the game.
